>
[Reaper's Crescent](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1879)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 35 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 575 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this alabaster _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)_ grows thick and pitted as the moon waxes, and it thins to a sharp sliver as the moon wanes. Moonlight also causes a second rune on the blade to change shape with the moon's phases: during the new and crescent moon, the weapon has the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) rune; during the quarter moon, the [_fearsome_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=731) rune; and during the gibbous and full moon, the [_wounding_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) rune.

 When wielded under moonlight of any strength, the reaper_'s crescent_ deals additional cold damage equal to the number of damage dice.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
